Description:
Aversaries may use to interact with a remote network share using Server Message Block (SMB).
This technique is used by post-exploitation frameworks.


Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Writing Local Admin Share
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (filepath like '%\\\\127.0.0%' and filepath like '%\admin$\%')
